snippet: LESSER--Herb, in Houston, on May 5. Beloved husband of Linda (nee Farfel) for 55 years; father of Larry (Laurie Davis) and Lori (Daniel Shuchman); grandfather of Judah, Aaron and Ariela. Born in Ft. Worth, TX in 1937; Rice University, Fulbright Scholar and Princeton PhD in chemical engineering. Careers in energy (Exxon, Mitchell Energy) and finance (UBS). President of Seven Acres Jewish Senior Care Services. Loved travel, opera, museums, financial news, Houston sports teams (fair or foul weather), nature, math and science, dining with friends and entertaining his grandchildren. Amateur genealogist, photographer and astronomer; frequent search engine for Internet humor. Above all, a truly kind and decent man who enjoyed life. He will be sorely missed. Donations may be made to Seven Acres: sevenacres.org. 1/3
